heading: Experimentation with Gen AI for code refactoring
description: Experimented with internal TELUS generative AI tools for code refactoring. Shared findings and starting point at bi-weekly TELUS Tech Forum with 80 team members x 10 mins of learning

heading: Micro frontend benefits
description: Shared benefits of micro frontends and live demo of usages at the 2023 TELUS Tech Conference for 400+ team members x 40 mins of learning
